statements: SELECT id, username, avatar_url, progress FROM user_profiles;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, progress FROM user_profiles WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT id, username FROM user_profiles ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT avatar_url, username FROM user_profiles WHERE avatar_url IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, username, progress FROM user_profiles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT progress, username, id FROM user_profiles WHERE progress > 50 ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT id, avatar_url, progress FROM user_profiles WHERE username LIKE 'j%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE progress BETWEEN 20 AND 80 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_profiles ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username, progress FROM user_profiles WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT * FROM game_scores WHERE game_name='Chess';
SELECT user_id, game_name, MAX(score) AS highest_score FROM game_scores GROUP BY user_id, game_name;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT username, progress FROM user_profiles WHERE progress > 50 ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, avatar_url FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM game_scores WHERE game_name = 'Chess' ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT user_id, game_name, score FROM game_scores WHERE score < 100
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT username, progress FROM user_profiles WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT a.achievement_name, a.description, ua.timestamp FROM achievements a JOIN user_achievements ua ON a.achievement_id = ua.achievement_id;
SELECT username, avatar_url FROM user_profiles WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, progress FROM user_profiles WHERE progress < 10 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT username, progress, avatar_url FROM user_profiles WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT achievement_name, description FROM achievements WHERE LENGTH(description) > 50;

SELECT user_id, user_profiles.username, achievements.achievement_name FROM user_profiles JOIN user_achievements ON user_profiles.user_id = user_achievements.user_id JOIN achievements ON user_achievements.achievement_id = achievements.achievement_id;

SELECT user_profiles.username, COUNT(user_achievements.achievement_id) AS achievement_count FROM user_profiles LEFT JOIN user_achievements ON user_profiles.user_id = user_achievements.user_id GROUP BY user_profiles.username HAVING achievement_count > 0;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, progress FROM users WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT user_id, username, avatar_url FROM users WHERE avatar_url IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM achievements ORDER BY achieved_date DESC;
SELECT u.username, c.course_name FROM users u JOIN user_courses uc ON u.user_id = uc.user_id JOIN courses c ON uc.course_id = c.course_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, progress FROM users WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT user_id, avatar_url FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM achievements WHERE achievement_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT u.username, c.course_name FROM users u JOIN user_courses uc ON u.user_id = uc.user_id JOIN courses c ON uc.course_id = c.course_id WHERE u.progress < c.course_progress;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT username, progress FROM user_profiles WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT badge_name, badge_description FROM badges;
SELECT user_id, score FROM user_scores ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT achievement_name, achievement_description FROM achievements WHERE achievement_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_profiles WHERE progress > 50 ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT avatar_url FROM user_profiles WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND progress < 100;
SELECT * FROM user_scores ORDER BY score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT badge_name, badge_description FROM badges WHERE badge_id IN (1, 3, 5);
